content.text: Hi, I am a 70 year old man. My biggest fear is not being able to perform my best on stage. My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy. I'm 5'10" but I feel like I'm taller than that because of my hair.

Hi, I am a 39 year old woman. I don't mind my family, but we don't have a lot in common. I am a genius, but my parents have no idea about my hobby. I have 3 brothers. After finishing my career I discovered that I am not that passionate about it. I love to hike.
I am a genius, but my parents have no idea about my hobby. I love to hike.
Oh, that is a nice hobby. I do not do that often.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play guitar. I have been playing since I was a little boy.
That is cool. I have always wanted to play an instrument.
You should try it. It is a lot of fun.
Good. I am sure you will be great at it.
Thank you. I think I will start looking into it.
